00149    /*
00150    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00151    */
00152    template <class Archive>
00153    void IntraPairAutoCorr::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00154    {
00155       if (!isInitialized_) {
00156          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00157       }
00158 
00159       // Data not set by readParam
00160       ar & accumulator_;
00161       ar & data_;
00162       ar & nMolecule_;
00163 
00164       // Data set by readParam (check consistency).
00165       serializeCheck(ar, speciesId_, "speciesId");
00166       serializeCheck(ar, atom1Id_, "atom1Id");
00167       serializeCheck(ar, atom2Id_, "atom2Id");
00168       serializeCheck(ar, capacity_, "capacity");
00169 
00170    }
